title: VW Camper needed for Children's Charity in West Sussex

posts.content:
PM Sent

Noel : Thanks for the offer, going to try and arrange for JZ to go and see if the chair will fit, its good for them to have a few people willing to help in case closer to the time one or the other isn't able to help but plenty of time to sort things out. Feel free to drop me an email with your details to johnrampton@gmail.com

Thanks again guys

I am in West Sussex (East Grinstead) and happy to help.
As a thought, could the chair not go in the back and the girl in the passenger seat at the front (she'd have a nicer ride and could be strapped in) or is her disability such that she can't be taken in and out of the chair, or sit on the bench seat?

Anyway put me on the list of willing for this or anything else to do with the hospice.

I don't check in here that often so PM me if you need me

Hi JZ,

I've dropped you a PM, could you email me some contact details please to johnrampton@ gmail.com the lady from Chestnut Tree House is chasing me to get the chair checked for size so that we can look for an alternative if needs be.

Many thanks,

John.
quick update...im meeting the family on sunday to see if we can make this happen!
Sounds like a high roof bus would be the go.
good news, with the bulkhead seat removed the wheelchair will fit ok!
